definitions.definition: A muscle that tightens or stretches a part, or renders it tense .
A mathematical object that describes linear relations on scalars , vectors , matrices and other algebraic objects, and is represented as a multidimensional array .

subdefinitions.definition: A multidimensional array with (at least) two dimensions.

definitions.definition: A norm operation on the quaternion algebra .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) A muscle that tightens or stretches a part, or renders it tense . [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics , linear algebra , physics ) A mathematical object that describes linear relations on scalars , vectors , matrices and other algebraic objects, and is represented as a multidimensional array . [from 18th c.]
( mathematics , obsolete ) A norm operation on the quaternion algebra .
